EmailTemplate.name: Youth Board 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge Society - Youth Board 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Welcome to Youth Board!
Firstly, a huge thank you to those who attended our first meeting last night. We definitely got an insight into what you want out of the Ignite event!
For those who couldn't attend, fear not there is one more meeting before Ignite, and that will be your last chance to get involved for this particular event.
PLEASE NOTE THE DATE HAS NOW CHANGED TO:
Evening meeting: Wednesday 18th November 2015 5pm - 6:30pm To finalise your workshop plan and to go over the rota for the day to ensure you all get to participate in the event.
This session will be held at our North London office: The Challenge Network, Unit 2, The Courtyard (follow "Valet Parking" sign) 53-79 Highgate Studios, Highgate Road, London, NW5 1TL
Nearest stations: Kentish Town & Gospel Oak
Please reply to josephine.jengo@the-challenge.org to confirm your attendance
See you there!
The Challenge Society
